short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Eve - Your AI-Powered Data Assistant, the FIRST of its kind.

Transform your browser into a sophisticated data command center…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Eve - Your AI-Powered Data Assistant, the FIRST of its kind.

Transform your browser into a sophisticated data command center with Eve, the Chrome extension that turns complex information into clear customizable insights. Whether you’re analyzing documents, extracting website data, or seeking real-time insights, Eve streamlines your workflow with the power of advanced AI. 

Why Choose Eve?

PRIVACY YOU CAN TRUST

Your data privacy is our priority. All interactions with Eve are stateless, ensuring that no data between you and the tool is stored in our database and are not used for model training. Furthermore, your templates and conversations are saved locally on your browser’s device, keeping your information secure and within your control.

INSTANT DATA ANALYSIS

Point Eve at any webpage or document, and watch as it instantly extracts and analyzes key information using our innovative EAT framework:

-Extract: Pulls relevant data from any source
-Analyze: Processes information intelligently
-Transform: Converts findings into actionable insights

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE

-Design templates that match your workflow
-Choose your preferred AI model (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Google Gemini 1.5 Pro)
-Fine-tune parameters for optimal results

POWERFUL AD FREE SEARCH INTEGRATION

- Access real-time data through Vertex AI Search
- Bring relevant information when you need it

SMART MEETING ASSISTANT
- Never miss a detail during Google Meet sessions with automated note-taking and key point summarization

Whether you’re researching, analyzing, or making decisions, Eve ensures you’re always working with clarity and precision.

Ready to transform how you work with data? Add Eve to Chrome today!
